Action.author: vdods
Action.body: Just to be clear, would this include the ability to specify a custom endorsement policy via golang, say during chaincode installation/instantiation?

Action.author: vdods
Action.body: If the endorsement policy were to be customized, it would make sense not to specify it at the peer level, but at the channel level – a peer may be part of several unrelated channels, each having their own rules regarding transactions (i.e. endorsement policies).
